BONUS TIKET 03: Napred uz duplu pobedu Kopljanika
Nema zime za kvotu 20,00 uz puno poverenje u Ajaks i PSŽ

01 Nov 2019

Nema zime za kvotu 20,00 uz puno poverenje u Ajaks i PSŽ
Super je kvota 14,56, a šta bi nam falilo da ista stvarčica vredi koeficijenta 20,00? Razume se, baš ništa, što je ponuda koju baš nigde ne možete naći sem u MOZZART svetu najbolje kladilačke zabave. Vremaena ima dovoljno da dođete u posed BONUS TIKETA 03. Precizno do 20.00 časova, do kada na svakom uplatnom mestu možete da se poslužite ovim listićem, ili da se odlučite da do ovog tiketa dođete posredstvom mozzartbet.com aplikacije.


20.00: (17,0) CVOLE (10,0) AJAKS (1,12)



20.30: (1,45) HOFENHAJM (4,70) PADERBORN (6,75)



20.45: (15,00) DIŽON (7,25) PSŽ (1,18)



20.45: (2,70) BARNSLI (3,25) BRISTOL SITI (2,65)


Šta čekamo? Jasno, reč je o vrlo realnoj duploj pobedi Ajaksa i PSŽ-a, te o kombinaciji 1-1&3+ na Hofenhajmi i pojačane duple šanse na Barnsli protiv Bristol Sitija kroz igru X2&2+. Toliko o kladilački realističnim prognozama, dovoljno o nadrealno visokim kvotama koje se same nude da ih pokupite. Sve porudžbine na BONUS TIKET 03 primamo, samo ne i žalopojke u slučaju da prođe, a vi zažalite što se ranije ne videsmo, odnosno što do 20.00 časova niste obavili vaš kladilački domaći zadatak.





* Kvote su podložne promenama

No winter for 20.00 with full confidence in Ajax and PSG

01 Nov 2019

No winter for 20.00 with full confidence in Ajax and PSG
It's a great odds of 14.56, and what would it be wrong for the same thing to be worth the odds of 20.00? Of course, nothing is an offer you can't find anywhere but the MOZZART best betting party. There is enough time to get hold of the BONUS TICKET 03. Precisely until 8 pm, by which time you can use this ticket at any payment point, or decide to come to this ticket through the mozzartbet.com application.


20.00: (17.0) CVOLE (10.0) AJAKS (1.12)



8.30pm: (1.45) HOFENHEIM (4.70) PADERBORN (6.75)



20.45: (15,00) DIJON (7,25) PSG (1,18)

What are we waiting for? Clearly, this is a very real double win for Ajax and PSG, and a combination of 1-1 & 3 + at Hoffenheim and increased double chances at Barnsley against Bristol City through X2 & 2 +. So much for betting realistic forecasts, enough for the surreal high odds that are offered to pick you up. All orders on the BONUS TICKET 03 are received, but not complaints in case it passes, and you regret not seeing you sooner, that is, by 20.00 you have not completed your betting homework.





* Odds are subject to change
